channel.title: Item Requirements? Can someone help me?
channel.description: Well, I don't want people using Partyhats, so I want to make a member system. I want it to say when you try to wield a certain items "You need ot be a member to wield this" I'd appreciate it if you could help. Thanks.

item.title: Item Requirements? Can someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

search for CLStrength and just duplicate all of that onto another line but make it CLMemb0r

and eventualy the CLStrength part wil look like

if (939)
return;

idk, but under that part make sure its only…

if(1044)
return;

crap idk… im not the rite person, i no theres an easier way but i need 2 no this 2 i guess

Read full topic
